rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall designed to be open and airy, following Vastu principles for prosperity.
An expansive living room connected with the kitchen forming an open-plan layout. This space is designed to allow natural light and air flow, enhancing the sense of openness.
A modern kitchen with ample storage and a functional layout. Located adjacent to the living room for convenience, ensuring that cooking smells don't interfere with the dining area.
The master bedroom is placed in the North-East corner as per Vastu, promoting health and happiness for the occupants. It includes an attached bathroom.
A spacious room designed for children or guests, positioned in the East to receive early morning sunlight.
Positioned adjacent to the master bedroom with natural light and a serene environment for reading and studying.
A guest room positioned in the South-West to ensure privacy while receiving late afternoon sunlight.
